name: Primus Campfire Chopsticks
description: Handsome, packable chopsticks that elevate trailside ramen-noodle or backcountry scrambled eggs. Made of rosewood, with durable threaded brass couplings so you can split them in half for compact storage and travel.Attractive rosewood.Durable threaded brass couplings.Half-length, 12.5cm segments for easy storage and transport.Fabric cover included.
